DOC.brief_summary: This Is A Study Of Bioavailability And Food Effect For Fesoterodine.
DOC.brief_title: This Is A Study Of Bioavailability And Food Effect For Fesoterodine.
DOC.detailed_description: To estimate the bioavailability of three different 4 mg fesoterodine ER beads-incapsule formulations compared to 4 mg fesoterodine marketed ER tablets under fasting and fed conditions.
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subjects between the ages of 18 and 55 years Evidence or history of clinically significant disease
